TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripComboBox extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost

summary.span: 表示正确呈现在 中的 。

span.span: Represents a that is properly rendered in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 针对在中承载的进行了优化 。 is the optimized for hosting in a . 托管控件的属性和事件的子集在 级别公开，但基础 控件可通过属性完全访问 。A subset of the hosted control's properties and events are exposed at the level, but the underlying control is fully accessible through the property. 显示与组合的编辑字段 ，允许用户从列表中进行选择或输入新文本。A displays an editing field combined with a , allowing the user to select from the list or to enter new text. 默认情况下，会 显示带有隐藏下拉列表的编辑字段。By default, a displays an edit field with a hidden drop-down list. 属性确定要显示的组合框的样式。The property determines the style of combo box to display. 您可以输入一个允许简单下拉列表的值，其中，列表始终显示，一个下拉列表框，其中的文本部分无法编辑，并且您必须选择一个箭头来查看下拉列表框或默认下拉列表框（文本部分可编辑，并且用户必须按箭头键才能查看列表）。You can enter a value that allows for a simple drop-down, where the list always displays, a drop-down list box, where the text portion is not editable and you must select an arrow to view the drop-down list box, or the default drop-down list box, where the text portion is editable and the user must press the arrow key to view the list. 若要始终显示用户不能编辑的列表，请使用 控件。To always display a list that the user cannot edit, use a control. 若要在运行时向列表中添加对象，请使用方法分配对象引用数组 。To add objects to the list at run time, assign an array of object references with the method. 然后，列表显示每个对象的默认字符串值。The list then displays the default string value for each object. 可以通过方法添加单个对象 。You can add individual objects with the method. 除了显示和选择功能 外，还提供了一些功能，使您能够有效地将项添加到 和以在列表的项中查找文本。In addition to display and selection functionality, the also provides features that enable you to efficiently add items to the and to find text within the items of the list. 使用 和 方法可以向中添加大量项， 而无需在每次向列表中添加项时重新绘制控件。The and methods enable you to add a large number of items to the without the control being repainted each time an item is added to the list. 使用 和 方法可以搜索列表中包含特定搜索字符串的项。The and methods enable you to search for an item in the list that contains a specific search string. 使用 属性可获取或设置下拉列表中的当前项，使用 属性可获取或设置对下拉列表中当前项的引用。Use the property to get or set the current item in the drop-down list, and use the property to get or set a reference to the current item in the drop-down list. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 具有各种属性设置的，包括自动完成。The following code example demonstrates a with various property settings, including automatic completion. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps/VB/form1.vb#0)]

summary.span: 获取或设置当 属性设置为 时使用的自定义字符串集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the custom string collection to use when the property is set to .
An that contains the strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 、 和 属性创建一个 ，它通过将输入的前缀与维护的源中的所有字符串的前缀进行比较来自动完成输入字符串。Use the , , and properties to create a that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source. 这对于 经常输入 url、地址、文件名或命令的控件很有用。This is useful for controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered. 属性的使用 是可选的，但必须将 属性设置为才能 使用 。The use of the property is optional, but you must set the property to in order to use . 您必须同时使用 和 属性。You must use the and properties together. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了用于设置各种属性的语法 ，包括 属性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various properties, including the property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将各项逐一添加到 时维持性能。

span.span: Maintains performance when items are added to the one at a time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法阻止控件绘制，直到 调用方法为止。This method prevents the control from painting until the method is called. 向添加项的首选方法 是 通过 的属性使用方法 。The preferred way to add items to the is to use the method through the property of the . 这使您可以一次向列表中添加一组项。This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time. 但是，如果你想要使用方法一次添加一个项 ，则可以使用 方法防止每次向列表中添加项时重新绘制控件 。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the each time an item is added to the list. 完成向列表中添加项的任务后，调用 方法以使 能够重绘。Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the method to enable the to repaint. 在将大量项添加到列表中时，这种添加项的方法可能会阻止在绘图期间发生闪烁。This way of adding items can prevent flicker during the drawing of the when a large number of items are being added to the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 为了保持更好的性能，不应 在其构造函数中设置的。In order to maintain better performance, you should not set the of a in its constructor. 首选方法是重写 属性。The preferred method is to override the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `ToolStripComboBox1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripComboBox1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 向添加项的首选方法 是 通过 的属性使用方法 。The preferred way to add items to the is to use the method through the property of the . 这使您可以一次向列表中添加一组项。This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time. 但是，如果你想要使用方法一次添加一个项 ，则可以使用 方法防止每次向列表中添加项时重新绘制控件 。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the each time an item is added to the list. 完成向列表中添加项的任务后，调用 方法以使 能够重绘。Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the method to enable the to repaint. 在将大量项添加到列表中时，这种添加项的方法可能会阻止在绘图期间发生闪烁。This way of adding items can prevent flicker during the drawing of the when a large number of items are being added to the list.

returns.span: 找到的第一个项的从零开始的索引；如果未找到匹配项，则返回 -1。

span.span: The zero-based index of the first item found; returns -1 if no match is found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行的搜索不区分大小写。The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive. `s`参数是要与组合框列表中的项关联的文本进行比较的子字符串。The `s` parameter is a substring to compare against the text associated with the items in the combo box list. 搜索从文本的开头开始执行部分匹配，并返回列表中与指定的子字符串匹配的第一项。The search performs a partial match starting from the beginning of the text, and returning the first item in the list that matches the specified substring. 然后，您可以执行任务，如删除包含搜索文本或更改项文本的项。You can then perform tasks, such as removing the item that contains the search text or changing the item's text. 找到指定的文本后，如果要在中搜索文本的其他实例 ，请使用 方法指定中的起始索引 。Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the , use method to specify a starting index within the . 如果希望搜索完全匹配的单词而不是部分匹配项，请使用 方法。If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为时 `true` ，控件将自动调整大小以确保某个项未部分显示。When this property is set to `true`, the control automatically resizes to ensure that an item is not partially displayed. 如果要根据窗体的空间要求来维护的原始大小 ，请将此属性设置为 `false` 。If you want to maintain the original size of the based on the space requirements of your form, set this property to `false`. 如果不 包含任何项，则此属性不起作用。If the does not contain any items, this property has no effect. 设置 属性将属性重置 为 `false` 。Setting the property resets the property to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDropDown(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnDropDown (e As EventArgs)
abstract member OnDropDown : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnDropDown : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’ method so that registered delegates receive the event.

member this.SelectedIndex : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指定当前选定项的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index specifying the currently selected item.

value.span: 当前选定项的从零开始的索引。

span.span: A zero-based index of the currently selected item.

value.span: 如果未选定任何项，则返回值为负一 (-1)。

span.span: A value of negative one (-1) is returned if no item is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示组合框列表中当前选定项的从零开始的索引。This property indicates the zero-based index of the currently selected item in the combo box list. 设置新索引会引发 事件。Setting a new index raises the event. **注意** 若要取消选择当前选定的项，请将设置 为-1。**Note** To deselect the currently selected item, set the to -1.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SelectedIndexChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 在 属性的值更改后发生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `ToolStripComboBox1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripComboBox1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#581](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#581)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#581](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#581)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ SelectedItem { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.SelectedItem : obj with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 中当前选定的项。

span.span: Gets or sets currently selected item in the .

value.span: 作为当前选定项的对象，如果当前没有选定项，则为 。

span.span: The object that is the currently selected item or if there is no currently selected item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 属性设置为对象时， 会尝试使该对象成为列表中当前选定的对象。When you set the property to an object, the attempts to make that object the currently selected one in the list. 如果在列表中找到该对象，则该对象将显示在的 "编辑" 部分中， 并将 属性设置为相应的索引。If the object is found in the list, it is displayed in the edit portion of the and the property is set to the corresponding index. 如果列表中不存在该对象，则该 属性将保留其当前值。If the object does not exist in the list, the property is left at its current value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SelectedText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SelectedText : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 的可编辑部分中选定的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is selected in the editable portion of a .

value.span: 表示组合框中当前选定文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the currently selected text in the combo box.

value.span: 如果 设置为 ，则返回值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: If is set to , the return value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以为此属性分配文本，以更改组合框中当前选定的文本。You can assign text to this property to change the text currently selected in the combo box. 如果当前未在组合框中选择文本，此属性将返回一个长度为零的字符串。If no text is currently selected in the combo box, this property returns a zero-length string.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelectionLength { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SelectionLength : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 的可编辑部分中选定字符的数目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of characters selected in the editable portion of the .
The number of characters selected in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在对所选文本执行操作之前，可以使用此属性确定组合框控件中当前是否已选择任何字符。You can use this property to determine whether any characters are currently selected in the combo box control before performing operations on the selected text. 如果将属性的值 设置为大于控件文本内的字符数的值，则属性的值 将设置为控件中的文本的整个长度减去 (属性的值（ 如果为属性) 指定了任何值） 。When the value of the property is set to a value that is larger than the number of characters within the text of the control, the value of the property is set to the entire length of text within the control minus the value of the property (if any value is specified for the property).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelectionStart { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SelectionStart : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 中选定文本的起始索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the starting index of text selected in the .

value.span: 当前选中文本的字符串中第一个字符的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the first character in the string of the current text selection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在控件中未选择任何文本，此属性将指示新文本的插入点。If no text is selected in the control, this property indicates the insertion point for new text. 如果将此属性设置为超出控件中文本长度的位置，则所选内容的起始位置位于最后一个字符之后。If you set this property to a location beyond the length of the text in the control, the selection start position is placed after the last character. 在文本框控件中选择文本时，更改此属性可释放属性的值 。When text is selected in the text box control, changing this property can release the value of the property. 如果控件中由属性指示的位置之后的剩余文本 小于属性的值 ，则 自动减小属性的值。If the remaining text in the control after the position indicated by the property is less than the value of the property, the value of the property is automatically decreased. 属性的值 从不导致 属性增加。The value of the property never causes an increase in the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Sorted { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Sorted : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 中的项是否已排序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the items in the are sorted.

value.span: 如果对组合框进行了排序，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the combo box is sorted; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定是否对 现有条目进行排序，并将新条目添加到列表中的相应排序位置。This property specifies whether the sorts existing entries and add new entries to the appropriate sorted position in the list. 您可以使用此属性自动对中的项进行排序 。You can use this property to automatically sort items in a . 将项添加到排序后 ，项将移动到排序列表中的相应位置。As items are added to a sorted , the items are moved to the appropriate location in the sorted list. 将属性设置为时 `false` ，会将新项添加到现有列表的末尾。When you set the property to `false`, new items are added to the end of the existing list. 排序不区分大小写，按字母顺序升序排列。The sort is case-insensitive and in alphabetically ascending order. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了用于设置各种属性的语法 ，包括 属性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various properties, including the property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.CommonProps/VB/form1.vb#1)]
